des:
This skill is for DIY people, who created their own smart home based on "Home Assistant" (https:// www.home-assistant.io/).

You can now use Alexa to control lights, switches, and thermostats with the comfort of voice. This skill requires the "Home Assistant" solution. Currently, the support includes lights, switches, plugs, outlets, and thermostats.

To do all of this, Follow these steps:

1- Set up your Alexa devices using the Amazon Alexa app
2- Open the menu, go to 'Skills & Games'
3- Then click on the search icon in the top right
4- Search for "Home for the Nafzigers" 
5- Click on the 'Link your account'
6- Link your account with your administrator-provided login
7- Bam! You are done!

You can now turn your lights ON and OFF with your voice!


Any issues and you can email us at “skill@nafzigers.com”.
